section.name: Features List
section.p:
Implemented features can be split into two categories :
opendbcopy core component
opendbcopy plugins

subsection.name: opendbcopy core component
subsection.p:
opendbcopy core component can be seen as an application framework providing everything required to run a plugin. Configure a database migration project using the opendbcopy graphical user interface. This includes:
Database Connection Details
Database catalog/schema
Tables to process, Table Mapping
Columns to process, Column Mapping, Table specific SQL filters
Global String filters (such as trim, removal of intermediate whitespaces, ...)
Plugin(s) to execute
Saving Project as XML
opendbcopy tries to map tables and columns automatically given its names. To take care of referential integrity constraints let opendbcopy read this extra information.

subsection.name: opendbcopy plugins
subsection.p:
opendbcopy provides a set of standard plugins. Runtime parameters are loaded from a central plugins.xml file, containing a plugin entry for each plugin with individual properties. New plugins can easily be developed (see developer manual). This includes:
Online Migration of databases (only logging records which cannot be processed)
Write dump files such as csv, tab delimited, ...
Write SQL data scripts
Comparing number of records for each database and write a nice report

section.i: For more information, please see the user manual
